alert.note: Alert for Chatanika River Valley; Delta Junction; Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Eielson AFB and Salcha; Fairbanks Metro Area; Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills; Nenana; Northern Denali Borough; Southern Denali Borough; Tanana Flats; Two Rivers; Upper Chena River Valley; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 5:56AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Another Round of Snow Saturday and Sunday... Snow is expected from this evening through Sunday night for the Southeast Interior, including the White Mountains, the Fairbanks area, and the Alaska Range. General snow totals of around 2 to 4 inches are expected, with the higher amounts toward and in the Alaska Range and lower amounts for the Interior. Blustery northeast winds will accompany the snow at times, especially over the higher elevations. Localized blowing snow is possible. Snow will largely taper off by Sunday night.
